title: Reasonable Adjustments – HMCTS - GOV.UK
feedback: This is a new service – your feedback will help us to improve it.

intro.heading: I want to tell you that my support needs have changed
intro.paragraph1: Use this form to tell us if your support needs have changed. You might not need something any more, or you can request something new.
intro.blurb: You will be able to review your application before you submit it.

form.command: Select all that apply to you

charCount.hint: You can enter up to {count} characters

form.noSupport: I do not need any support at this time

typeahead.heading: Which {flagName} do you need to request?
typeahead.hint: Start typing to choose the support, or select 'The support is not listed
typeahead.control: Enter the type of support you need to request

radio.control: Enter the type of support you need to request

support.new: New support you want to request now

message.base: We use some essential cookies to make this service work. We’d also like to use analytics cookies so we can understand how you use the service and make improvements.
message.accept: You’ve accepted analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.
message.reject: You’ve rejected analytics cookies. You can change your cookie settings at any time.

analytics.legend: Allow cookies that measure website use?

items.on: Use cookies that measure my website use
items.off: Do not use cookies that measure my website use

apm.legend: Allow cookies that measure website application performance monitoring?

items.on: Use cookies that measure website application performance monitoring
items.off: Do not use cookies that measure website application performance monitoring
